name: WebGLRenderingContext.isBuffer
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.isBuffer() method of the WebGL API returns true if the passed WebGLBuffer is valid and false otherwise.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isBuffer' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
